programme.desc: The Avalanche try to solve the Jets as the Central Division rivals clash. Winnipeg stymied Colorado in the first meeting on Nov. 7, as Connor Hellebuyck stopped all 35 Avalanche shots and Gabriel Vilardi scored the lone goal in a 1-0 Jets win.

programme.title: NHL Hockey St. Louis Blues at Chicago Blackhawks
programme.sub-title: St. Louis Blues at Chicago Blackhawks
programme.desc: The Blues and Blackhawks face off in the Winter Classic at Wrigley Field. Chicago is 1-5 all-time outdoors, and lost to Detroit at the Friendly Confines in 2009. St. Louis beat Chicago at Busch Stadium in 2017, and Minnesota at Target Field in 2022.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Thomas Patrick McNulty is given a watch that possesses a strange power.

programme.desc: Two small-time promoters find that their fighter can't meet his opponent in the ring. With Lee Marvin.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Tough aliens from outer space try to poison the population of earth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The morning after a wild party, a couple wakes up in a totally unfamiliar and artificial place.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Liz Powell has a recurring dream in which she follows a nurse to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man (William Demarest) sees himself on television, killing his wife (Joan Blondell).

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A timid man (Burgess Meredith) acquires superhuman strength; with Don Rickles.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Two men try to make their fortune at Las Vegas from the power one of them has to move inanimate objects.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: A jockey's wish to become a giant in his profession has repercussions he may regret. With Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A book about thought gives a clerk the power to accomplish anything just by willing it, leaving him free to create an ideal world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Librarian Romney Wordsworth is condemned to death for obsolescence.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A crippled Civil War soldier comes to realize that he and the people around him are not walking away from battle; they are dead.

programme.desc: A guerrilla leader succeeds in overthrowing the regime of the corrupt government of his country.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A gunman (Lee Marvin) visits the grave of a man who vowed revenge.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: The Earth falls out of its orbit and starts moving toward the sun.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: A down-and-out man steals the fancy shoes from the body of a murdered gangster and finds himself living in the dead man's footsteps.

programme.desc: An insufferable cowboy star comes face to face with the real Jesse James.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old man thinks children's games can restore youth.

programme.desc: A piano given as a birthday present has a strange power over those who listen to it.
